quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Yuugumo-class destroyer number four – Naganami.

quotes.name: Details
quotes.quote: I'm Naganami, fourth ship of the Yuugumo class. During the War, I was primarily involved in transport operations, but I did participate in some large-scale operations and even served as flagship. Any hardship on the battlefield can be overcome as long as you believe in one another... I just know it!

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: So this place is the port? Huh... Oh, Commander! I'm the fourth ship of the Yuugumo class, Naganami. It's a pleasure to finally meet you! Um... what's my selling point... Love! I love you, and everyone else as well!

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: Welcome back, Commander! Um, Naganami will always be waiting for you right here! That's because, well... I'm happiest when I'm by your side!

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: I give off warm and fuzzy vibes? Ehehe, I've heard that from the others as well~ It's a little embarrassing... Nuh uh, I don't mind at all. I'm really glad to hear it!

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: Jintsuu is always so knowledgeable and reliable... I wish I could be just like her...

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: Commander, can you let me be flagship next time? I'll work even harder, for the sake of everyone's happiness!

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: Lately, everyone has been circulating rumors that hugging me or cuddling my tail has healing properties, like coming out of a bath. They're even saying that it can cure colds... There's no way that's true, right?!

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: I'm more than just a ball of fluff, you know? Look, it's my smile and my ability to bring warmth to others that counts~

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: C-Commander, it's still work hoursss...

quotes.name: Mission reminder
quotes.quote: I can probably help out with transport missions, but as for other tasks... By the way, Commander, I see you tackling all sorts of different missions every day! That's really amazing!

quotes.name: Mission complete
quotes.quote: Mission complete! Great work today! Come, come, don't be shy – come rest on this big fluffy pillow!

quotes.name: Mail reminder
quotes.quote: Commander, new mail has arrived. Here, I brought it for you. Maybe someone brought good tidings!

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Commander, good job in battle! Hurry, come sit over here~ I'm going to give your shoulders a nice rub!

quotes.name: Commission complete
quotes.quote: Commander, everyone in the commission fleet has come home. I'm sure they're all tired, so I'll go give them a warm hug!

quotes.name: Enhancing complete
quotes.quote: The feeling of warmth and safety... this is what it feels like to get stronger... Commander, thank you very much!

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: I'm the flagship? All right, just leave it to me!

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: I didn't even realize I got MVP... But, this was only possible because of everyone's hard work!

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: I'll have to work much harder if I want to become an ideal flagship...

quotes.name: Skills
quotes.quote: Try this torpedo strike on for size!

quotes.name: Low HP
quotes.quote: My friends are still fighting, so I can't afford to go down here!

quotes.name: Upset
quotes.quote: Commander, if there's anything bothering you, please let me know. I'll be waiting for you... as long as it takes...

quotes.name: Stranger
quotes.quote: Everyone in the Mutsuki class is super fluffy and cute! Being at this port makes me so happy~!

quotes.name: Friendly
quotes.quote: My tail is warm and fluffy, but Wakaba's is shinier in comparison... Hatsushimo's is slender, and Shimakaze's is tiny... Um, there are all different sorts!

quotes.name: Crush
quotes.quote: Oyashio taught me a little trick! If I remember properly, it goes a little like... this! This circle on your forehead is supposed to make you luckier when it comes to your love life, and also helps you become happier!

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: Still not enough good fortune in your life? ...You leave me no other choice then! Even if you have bad luck, there's a way to compensate for it! I just have to pass it to you directly... Mmwah~

quotes.name: Promise
quotes.quote: Um... Commander, I thought we had grown a lot closer, but this still feels a bit awkward... Wh-what should I do? ...Ah! Commander, try hugging my tail! I'm sure its warmth and fluffiness will help you loosen up! Mhm!

quotes.name: Battle 1
quotes.quote: (2 of the following: IJN Kawakaze, IJN Kagerō, IJN Kuroshio, IJN Makinami) When we work together, the 2nd Torpedo Squadron will never lose!

quotes.name: Battle 2
quotes.quote: (1 of the following: IJN Jintsū, IJN Noshiro) It's an honor to fight at your side!

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Akashi pushed me into getting this outfit, saying that it would surely make you happy, but... What do you think...?
